name: Intellect Fortress II
text: This spell functions as intellect fortress I, but in addition, any mind-affecting effects that deal damage have their damage reduced by half (before any reduction due to a successful save or other effect). This applies to both hit point damage and ability score damage. This spell can be undercast.
area_zh: 以你自己为中心的20尺半径灵光
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同智能壁垒 I（Intellect Fortress I）一般，不过除此之外，任何造成伤害的影响心灵（mind-affecting）效果所造成的伤害都会减半（在任何由于豁免成功或其他效果造成的伤害降低之前结算）。该效果同时会应用至生命值伤害和属性伤害。该法术可以被降阶施法。
